title: Ip per win boosts
body: Just wanted to know if the per win boosts are worth getting. Note, I only have 400rp and probably will only get more rp once a year. I mean should I get a champion 3150ip on sale.

replies.body:
IP boosts are only worth if you are going for runes. Per win boosts will get you roughly 100-200 extra IP per win. So not really worth unless you want runes.

If you're only buying RP once a year, you should do so in a couple weeks when you get double the bonus RP.

I'm assuming you are a newer player and I understand the temptation to try want to spend RP on new champions. But I will suggest if you do so, try looking into bundles or waiting for a champ to be discounted. Bundles are usually pretty worth if you like 80% of the things in it.
Unless you desperately want IP for runes, just save it for getting a champion or skin, you will get alot more value out of it that way.

Well each win with the IP boost is about a bonus 200-300 IP/(how many games you bought)

I think that's what it is anyway
